metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15726 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition through 12.2.1. Embedded images and media files in markdown could be pointed to an arbitrary server, which would reveal the IP address of clients requesting the file from that server.

notes.Note: msalvatore> Affects all previous GitLab CE/EE versions.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
